Features 

Semrush Keyword Research

Semrush Keyword Research

Boost your traffic and conquer the SERPs with Semrush’s SEO keyword research tools.

Start Now
Keyword Overview

Find the best keywords to supercharge your digital marketing strategy. Discover the organic and advertising value of any keyword based on search volume, intent, keyword difficulty, number of results, CPC, competition level, SERP Features, variations, and more.

Try It Free
Learn more
Organic Research

Find ways to rank for your rivals’ most profitable keywords. Optimize your organic keywords and find new ways to win SERPs relevant to your target audience.

Try It Free
Learn more
Keyword Magic Tool

Generate thousands of keyword combinations from one seed keyword and explore a keyword toolbox with over 26 billion keywords.

Try It Free
Learn more
Keyword Gap

Discover new opportunities for launching efficient SEO campaigns. A simple solution to benchmark up to five keyword profiles at a time.

Try It Free
Learn more
Keyword Strategy Builder

Drive more traffic with a ready-made keyword strategy, complete with pillar pages and subpages to structure your website. Integrate your lists with other Semrush tools or export to share with your team.

Check it Out
Learn more
Organic Traffic Insights

Leverage Semrush’s integration with Google Analytics to discover “not provided” keywords and cross-reference data on your website’s organic search performance.

Try It Free
Learn more
Win the SERPs with the Semrush keyword research toolbox for SEO
Start Now
